title: Judge's Court, Judge's Rules
description: Judge John Hodgman and Bailiff Jesse Thorn are clearing the docket this week! They talk about how to deal with merchandise one receives by mistake, whistling, naming babies, going out post-cardio exercise, and much more!
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
